about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: I'm a passionate software engineer with a strong foundation in computer science and a deep love for creating innovative solutions. My journey in software began during my high school years, where I discovered my passion for coding and problem-solving.
about.paragraph2: Throughout my career, I've had the opportunity to work on diverse projects, from web applications to mobile games. This variety has helped me develop a versatile skill set and adaptability to new technologies and challenges.
about.paragraph3: I specialize in full-stack web development and game development, with expertise in technologies like React, Next.js, Node.js, and Unity. I'm always eager to learn new technologies and stay up-to-date with industry trends.

about.listItem3: Design and implement efficient backend solutions
about.listItem4: Optimize application performance and user experience
